product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: ELECTRICAL WORKS > LAYING OF CABLES > G.I. & PVC PIPES
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply and laying of following sizes of  G.I. Pipes (medium) in required length fixed on steel, concrete or similar structure, laid in trenches, ready to be buried in concrete including cutting, threading, bending and similar works, supply of clamps, small iron structures, spacers and installation of seats, plugs, bushings etc., small civil works, including all labour and materials, as per approved drawings, specifications of this tender and directions of Engineer-in-Charge. 50 mm NB.

product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: ELECTRICAL WORKS > LAYING OF CABLES > CABLE GLANDS
product_entries.full_product_description: Supply of nickel-plated, flame proof IIA/IIB double compression type brass cable glands, suitable for out door terminations of armoured PVC cables of following overall diameter (excluding termination and connection of cables), including all labour and materials, as per approved drawings, specifications of this tender and directions of Engineer-in-Charge. Cables with OD upto 20 mm.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: brass, plating: nickel, feature: flame proof, type: IIA/IIB (IIA/indoor, IIB/indoor), type: double compression, suitable for: outdoor terminations of armoured PVC cables
